Parts of Parañaque to be placed under 'strict' community quarantine tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738636 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/738636/parts-of-paranaque-to-be-placed-under-strict-community-quarantine/story/ Parts of several barangays in Parañaque City will be under strict community quarantine for three days as a measure against COVID-19 infection, according to Mao dela Cruz's report on Dobol B sa News TV on Monday. Mon, 18 May 2020 10:36:24 +0800
Differently abled learners must not be left behind in education sector's new normal --Gatchalian tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738635 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/738635/differently-abled-learners-must-not-be-left-behind-in-education-sector-s-new-normal-gatchalian/story/ "Sa pagpapatuloy ng edukasyon sa gitna ng krisis sa COVID-19, lalong dapat nating tutukan ang mga mag-aaral na may kapansanan at siguruhing hindi sila maiiwan," Senator Sherwin Gatchalian, Senate committee on education chair, said in a statement. Mon, 18 May 2020 10:36:06 +0800

Mon, 18 May 2020 10:01:30 +0800

Kapag palitan mo siya we will never know, napakahirap palitan dahil ang dami niyang programa in relation sa COVID. Siya yung nag-establish noong mga naunang quarantine," Gamboa said. Mon, 18 May 2020 09:47:07 +0800

These include the Kiangan Billeting Center and its taekwondo area. Mon, 18 May 2020 09:11:17 +0800

UK coronavirus death toll rises by 170, lowest increase since March; total deaths 34,636 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738622 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/738622/uk-coronavirus-death-toll-rises-by-170-lowest-increase-since-march-total-deaths-34-636/story/ The number of people who have died in the United Kingdom after testing positive for COVID-19 rose by 170 to 34,636, business minister Alok Sharma said on Sunday, the lowest increase in the official death toll since March 24.
